subject: Missed Our Neurodiversity Spotlight Preview? Watch the Recording!
body:
Hi Khadija,​
 
Just a quick follow-up in case you missed my earlier email:
 
Our live preview of 
Neurodiversity Inclusion in the Workplace
 was a big success, and the recording is now available!
 
Neurodiversity Inclusion in the Workplace
 
Feel free to share this resource with your team or network—it's packed with practical insights and actionable strategies for creating inclusive workplaces.
 
Have questions or want to explore cost-effective training solutions? Schedule a meeting with us using this 
calendar link
.
 
Wishing you a wonderful holiday session!
 
All the best,
 
Pedro Seminario
 
Client Solutions Associate
 
Email: 
p.seminario@lcwmail.com
 
Phone: 773-389-5167 
 
Website
 | 
Twitter
 | 
Facebook
 | 
LinkedIn
 
View our upcoming events
 | 
Sign up for our newsletter
 
On Fri, Dec 6, 2024 at 12:04 PM, Pedro Seminario 
<
p.seminario@lcwmail.com
>
 wrote: 
Hi Khadija,​
 
Thank you for your interest in our recent live preview of the newest LCW Spotlight session on 
Neurodiversity Inclusion in the Workplace
. We’ve heard from other attendees that the session proved to be a catalyst for rich conversations in their organizations, and we're thrilled with the engagement and insights shared.
 
If you missed the live session—or want to revisit key moments—you can now access the recording!
 
Spotlight on Neurodiversity in the Workplace
 
This recording is a great resource to:
 
Catch up on what you missed if you were unable to attend.
Share with decision-making leaders and colleagues who couldn’t attend.
Reflect on ways to foster more inclusive environments for neurodivergent talent.
We believe that this preview will inspire deeper conversations within your team. Let us know if we can connect with you on scheduling sessions for your organization or if you'd like to learn more about our other award-winning, cost-effective training or consulting solutions.
 
Schedule a Meeting
 
For additional insights, feel free to explore our latest blog post on 
neurodiversity
.
 
Looking forward to connecting with you!
 
All the best,
 
Pedro Seminario
 
Client Solutions Associate
 
Email: 
p.seminario@lcwmail.com
 
Phone: 773-389-5167 
 
Website
 | 
Twitter
 | 
Facebook
 | 
LinkedIn
 
View our upcoming events
 | 
Sign up for our newsletter

From:
 Chuck Adams <c.adams@lcwmail.com> 
Sent:
 Thursday, December 12, 2024 5:58 PM
To:
 Pedro Seminario <P.seminario@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 ClientLeveling_Dec2024_MASTER-ASSIGNMENTS.xlsx
 
Hey, Pedro –
 
You’ll notice some clients here with your name on them. Those need to go onto your dormant client list for future mailings and campaigns.
 
Chuck Adams
 
(He/Him)
Chief Executive Officer
LCW

+1.773.938.4285
Mobile: +1.630.373.5068
